name: TC-59 | Phone number with special characters
fullName: TC-59 | Phone number with special characters
description: This test case checks the error response when sending an OTP with a phone number that contains special characters. It sends a request with a phone number that contains special characters and expects that the OTP is not sent. Request Body: sendOtpRequest: customerId: "00801975" phoneNumber: "+12$3456" bankCode: "00004" languageCode: "fr" Expected Response Body: status: "ERROR" error: code: "ERR_OTP_0001" message: "Failed to send OTP. Please try again." Actual Response Body: null
